law.history: Repealed 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 296, sec. 19, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 222, sec. 5. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 403, sec. 10. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 376, sec. 5. -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 206, sec. 5.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Conducting or participating in nonlicensed race prohibited -- Public nuisance, abatement.
